coreAttributes.name: Canine Crush
coreAttributes.description: A glass bottle of what looks to be some kind of beer. A label on the front shows a beautiful dog-girl down on all fours presenting her naked, dripping pussy to a greater dog-boy's erect, knotted dog-cock.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/20)]

A soothing wave of arcane energy washes over [npc.name]...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_PHYSIQUE, 1)] [#npc.incrementAlcoholLevel(0.05)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pop)] the cap off of the bottle of Canine Crush, before lifting it to [npc.her] waiting [npc.lips] and promptly downing the entire bottle. Although it tastes like a regular beer, a strange, musky aftertaste is left lingering on [npc.namePos] [npc.tongue].
useDescriptions.otherUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pop)] the cap off of the bottle of Canine Crush, before lifting it to [npc2.namePos] waiting [npc2.lips] and getting [npc2.her] to down the entire bottle. Although it tastes like a regular beer, a strange, musky aftertaste is left lingering on [npc2.namePos] [npc2.tongue].
